name: Abyssal Dye
flavorText: The inky blackness seems to grow even darker when exposed to the sun, as though it were drinking in the very light that touches it.
flavorTextHtml: The inky blackness seems to grow even darker when exposed to the sun, as though it were drinking in the very light that touches it.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
